attributes.action: Re- open Frenchay Hospital in Bristol
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the amount of bed shortages in the UK, I would like Frenchay Hospital re-opened to help the needs of the people of Bristol and surrounding areas.
The new hospital at Southmead is not coping and can take over an hour to get there and more during peak traffic hours, whereas Frenchay Hospital is easier from any direction as it is situated by the main arterial routes that feed in and out of the Bristol area.

rejection.details: Petition does not include a statement on what action you want the government to take.
